metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7576 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The http_basic_authenticate_with method in actionpack/lib/action_controller/metal/http_authentication.rb in the Basic Authentication implementation in Action Controller in Ruby on Rails before 3.2.22.1, 4.0.x and 4.1.x before 4.1.14.1, 4.2.x before 4.2.5.1, and 5.x before 5.0.0.beta1.1 does not use a constant-time algorithm for verifying credentials, which makes it easier for remote attackers to bypass authentication by measuring timing differences.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> In Oneiric-Saucy, rails package is just for transition; The rails package contains actual code from vivid onward precise_ruby-actionpack-2.3 -- documentation is buggy but doesn't contain an implmentation itself.

criterions.comment: rails-4.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ruby-actionpack-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
